title: DEBENHAMS
content:
I've spotted this in Prague lately: enormous well-shaped roman capitals of Debenhams logotype. And I adore it. Anyone know what typeface is it? Custom maybe? Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723213007im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0420_4697.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723213007im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0422_4311.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723213007im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0424_3413.jpg)
author: Grzegorz Rolek

comments.content: [Anziano Small Caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723213007/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fountain/anziano_sc/) is similar, but not quite.
